__e: Everything else requires a few more details.
A new day requires new thinking.
IN ONE BOMB THERE ARE PERHAPS A THOUSAND PIECES, AND EVERY PIECE REQUIRES A TEAM OF 50, 60, 70 PEOPLE.
It takes a lot of practice... but with this... you may one day fly free.
But what I'm saying is, the kind of justice I'm questing... requires a certain attitude that people might find... you know, extreme or unpleasant.
And that new day demands a new queen of the night!
There will be plenty of hard work to go around.
Requires much more power than you realize.
It takes a power of doing to step into something you haven't tried on before.
It requires knowing when not to.
Because that would require time and energy better spent doing literally anything else.
Yeah, I can easily see how it wouldn't take much courage... to get a notorious patriot off Devil's Island.
Yes, it takes a man who is sophisticated, who has been around, who has been to Paris and seen the beautiful snowmen in the Bois du Boulogne that only a Frenchman can make.
Maybe you'll change your mind about what it takes to get what you want.
Perhaps the best things in this world... require the biggest sacrifice.
My character would've done that at that point.
